A millenium ago, a massive war was waged all
over the Overworld against an evil entity.
This evil entity had an army of monsters that
faced off against us, the army of humans.
The leaders of all the major cities at the time
elected two champions to defeat the evil entity.
They were two brothers, both very skilled
fighters and well-known travelers. They were
to lead the human army agaisnt the monster
However, it was... not the fairest of fights.
In a duel, a human would certainly overwhelm
any average monster, with the proper
The monster army had numbers, though.
We ended up winning this war, but at
a great cost to humanity. Cities were
The rivers ran red with blood for many weeks.
The population took a big hit. Have you ever
noticed that Solus Town is actually somewhat
small for an entire town? Have you ever noticed
that our population isn't that large? Have you
ever noticed that we don't get very many
We are still recovering from the losses we

the loss of the two champions. They disappeared
around the time they were supposed to take
down the evil entity. No one is sure if they
died or fled or what, but now humanity had
to hunker down until the evil entity finally
This evil entity, he was vicious. He
was merciless. He was someone with true
malicious intent. He was pure evil. No
one that wished to wipe out an entire race

As your adventure continues, you'll start to rack up a lot of important key items. An alternative to constantly navigating to the Key Items menu is to use the Quick Access Menu. It is bound to Q by default, but it can be rebound.
